text: Title of project: This will be replaced with IMH consent
Please select the following statements if you agree with them. Please feel free to withdraw at any point.

1. I confirm that I have read and understood the information sheet dated 09/11/2020 for the above study. I have had the opportunity to consider the information, ask questions and have had these answered satisfactorily.
2. I understand that my participation is voluntary and that I am free to withdraw at any time without giving any reason up to two days after completion of the study.

3. I understand that my unanonymized data might be shared with the named 
researchers as listed in the information sheet.
4. I understand that my anonymized data might be shared with other researchers
5. I am over 18 years of age and I agree to take part in this study.
6. Enter your email Id if you would like to be informed about the summary from this study
7. Enter your email Id if you would like to be added to a prize draw
